t: Parliamentary question | Amazon and sales to minors | E-003956/2016 | European Parliament
s: However, recent media investigations have shown that a minor can purchase any product on the website without a parent or guardian, and by using their own bank card. They can buy alcohol simply by ticking the box ‘aged 18 and over’, while to purchase weapons they don't even need to do that.
